subject: #SSN2625 return money
description_text: Hi Can you please return my money and cancel this order? This order created 4 month ago and no news about estimated delivery date. I can't wait this order for the several years.

conversations.body_text: Hi Иван Ткачев,    We're currently coordinating with the logistics provider to arrange a return shipment and process your refund. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the delayed delivery.
